name: Textainer Group Holdings Limited
description: Textainer Group Holdings Limited is one of the world’s largest lessors of intermodal containers and a provider of container management services. Founded in 1979, Textainer has built a reputation for quality and reliability in the shipping industry. The company operates on a global scale, managing a fleet of over 3 million containers and serving a diverse range of customers, including shipping lines, freight forwarders, and logistics companies. Textainer's core business involves leasing containers for various uses, including shipping goods across oceans, storage, and even temporary housing solutions. The company is committed to sustainability and reducing its environmental impact by investing in eco-friendly container designs and efficient logistics solutions. Through its extensive network, Textainer also provides ancillary services such as container repair, modification, and refurbishment. The company focuses on maximizing the value of its container fleet and enhancing customer service through technology and innovation. With a strong financial foundation and a commitment to operational excellence, Textainer is well-positioned to capitalize on the growing demand for containerized shipping and logistics solutions worldwide.
ceo: Owen W. W. H. W. Lau

key_executives.name: Owen W. W. H. W. Lau
John A. R. G. B. W. L. A. K. Wong

seo.meta_title: Textainer Group Holdings Limited | Leading Container Leasing and Management
seo.meta_description: Explore Textainer Group Holdings Limited, a global leader in intermodal container leasing and management services. Discover our commitment to quality, sustainability, and innovation in logistics.

faq.question: What does Textainer do?
faq.answer: Textainer is a leading lessor of intermodal containers and provides container management services worldwide.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Textainer?
faq.answer: Owen W. W. H. W. Lau is the CEO of Textainer Group Holdings Limited.

faq.question: Where is Textainer headquartered?
faq.answer: Textainer is headquartered in Hamilton, Bermuda.

faq.question: What types of containers does Textainer lease?
faq.answer: Textainer leases standard dry containers, reefer containers, and specialized containers.
